titleInfo.title: S. B. Robinson, Clerk at L.S.U.

name.namePart: Theo. Lilienthal's Photographic Establishment, New Orleans, La.

mods.abstract: Handwritten on back- Valuable worker, was good at almost anything . An Englishman. Went with Mrs. B, Jack & Ned from Paducah, KY to St. Paul in 1870 & brought us back from St. P. to Wash n Wythenth 1870. Listed as Instructor in Penmanship and Bookkeeping, and Librarian (p. 6, 1870-1871 general catalog).
mods.accessCondition: Please submit an LSU Special Collections reference ticket at https://askus.lib.lsu.edu/special for any questions or comments about this digital object.
mods.note: LSU Photograph Collection, 1886-1926, Louisiana State University Archives, LSU Libraries, Baton Rouge, LA.

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
